Package com.bosch.security.config

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SecurityConfiguration
    The SecurityConfiguration interface stores all configuration information.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultSecurityConfiguration
    The reference SecurityConfiguration manages all the settings used by the Security in a single place.
    SecurityConfiguration.Threshold
    Models a simple threshold as a count and an interval, along with a set of actions to take if the threshold is exceeded.
